column2: we ordered the entrees.  Since I am not a steak fan
column3: I ordered the roasted chicken with a side of mashed potatoes and my bf ordered the 22 oz. dry aged rib-eye with the creamed spinach.  The potatoes were okay and my bf said the spinach was overwhelmed with the taste of blue cheese
column4: but that didn't stop him from eating the whole thing pretty much.  I enjoyed my chicken.  The portion was large and well priced although I did think my chicken came out cold.  You could taste hints of lemon and the skin was crispy.  My bf said the rib-eye was melt in your mouth and buttery
column5: one of the best he has ever had.  Our dog thought so too since he got to enjoy the left over bone after.
